title: Chopper Joins The Straw Hats! - One Piece Manga Bros Podcast - Drum Island
author: One Piece Manga Bros
description: Episode 8 of the One Piece Manga Bros Podcast covering chapters 130-154 of the manga (the Drum Island arc), featuring RuffSenpai, BoomSentai, SeeOhKnee & Volume One Podcast guests.

title: E133: Drum Island with a very special guest... ('One Piece' Series Review)
author: Volume One Podcast
description: Volume One podcast returns to One Piece to cover the Drum Island arc with a special guest. Hosts Josh Michaels and Mehgan Perine review the arc in their weekly anime and manga podcast.

title: One Piece Drum Island Arc (78-91) Review
author: dlstudios
description: Written review of the Drum Island Arc noting that it 'features both the best and worst aspects of One Piece,' praising how the arc sets up Chopper for joining the crew while the crew seeks a doctor for Nami.

title: One Piece: Drum Island Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Comprehensive summary, recap and review of the Drum Island Arc, covering the story, themes, and character development throughout the arc.

description: Detailed recap of the Drum Island Arc on TV Tropes, including episode-by-episode breakdown, character analysis, and trope identification.

title: A Raid! The Tin Tyrant and Tin Plate Wapol!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of One Piece Episode 79 on Crunchyroll with English subtitles.
